name: ORO® -HSMOC
description: ORO®-HSMOC is the only high-performance HSMOC with TransPhloem™ technology. ORO®-HSMOC provides improved emulsifying and superior translocation. Designed for use with foliar-applied, post-emergent herbicides, ORO®-HSMOC delivers faster translocation, faster absorption and better spreading and wetting for a dramatically superior level of weed killing performance.
